original: Bredin, Yngve, komminister, Jönköping, f. 4/6/07 i Öggestorp, Jönköp. 1., av prosten Alfred B. o. Bertha Gyl-lensvärd. G. 38 m. lär:an Gunborg Johansson. Barn: Håkan f. 41, Inge 45. — Stud:ex. i Jönköp. 27, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 28, teol. kand., prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Växjö stift 32. Tjg. s. e. o. prästman i Löt o. Alböke, Sofia förs. i Jönköp., Kalmar, Växjö o. Norrahammar, kyrkoadj. i Värnamo 38, kommin. i Kristina o. Ljungarums förs. i Jönköp. sed. 44. Timlär. v. Växjö komm. flicksk. 35-37, v. Värnamo sämrealsk. 38-44.
translated: Bredin, Yngve, vicar, Jönköping, b. June 4, 1907 in Öggestorp, Jönköp. County, the first child of the vicar Alfred B. and Bertha Gyllensvärd. Married in 1938 to teacher Gunborg Johansson. Children: Håkan, born in 1941, and Inge, born in 1945. Bredin passed his high school exam in Jönköping in 1927, obtained a bachelor's degree in theology in Lund in 1928, completed the practical theology exam and was ordained in Växjö Diocese in 1932. Bredin worked as a curate and temporary curate in the parishes of Löt, Alböke, Sofia, Jönköping, Kalmar, Växjö, and Norrahammar and as a church adjunct in Värnamo from 1938. He became a vicar in Kristina and Ljungarums parishes in Jönköping in 1944. He also worked as an hourly teacher at Växjö Girls' School from 1935 to 1937 and at Värnamo Lower Secondary School from 1938 to 1944.

teaches.name: Värnamo Lower Secondary School Hourly Teacher
